values: OMG!! what a horrible hour ive just spent! my baby, my wittle kitty was missing!! i went outside to sun bath with my sister at 1 and the kitties came out and just explored the pool area well at 3 we came in and we thought everyone was back in so my rents and i went the store and out to eat and then at 7 we noticed no one had seen loki, so we searched and searched in the house and then moved out side in the rain and i was almost in tears as my parents were out in the rain looking, and i was standing out side shaking his food bowl and i saw him, loki come around the corner of the house like we were disturbing a nap of his. it took us 20 minutes once we found him to get him to come in, my poor baby all alone outside with rain and lightening, he hates the water so he hide under the stairs on our porch. hes alot smarter than we give him credit for, i think. he smells like dirt and hes been eating grass becuz no one was home to let him in when he came to the door scratching and meowing when it started raining, becuz we were at the store and i had forgotten to check that he was in when ash and i came in, my poor baby. but he seems hokay no scratches or stuff. my poor baby, id have been so very very upset if he hadn't been found. aww! hes sneezing i hope he doesn't have a cold, the poor baby. ohh hes so cute my little baby. well sides this dramatizing event, i woke up with blood on my pillow, appartently my ear is going to bleed for a while, and i can't pick out the dried blood until my ear appointment. very gross, hoping to go to amandas shin dig, but my ear hurts and i don't want to take loratabs at amandas. that could end badly or i could just pass out. later peeps im going to hug and squeeze my poor little baby. :(

yes well interesting day i had, i was chilling in chemistry, bored as hell. very very very bored. have I put emphasis on the whole bored part? 
 hokay. so i was playing with my metal necklace, first mistake, then i lost control of my springy necklace and it went in my ear, far far into my ear. so after not screaming out in pain for some terrible minutes i put my finger in to find lots and lots of blood, went to the nurse, she tried to clean out my ear, but it was hopeless their was to much blood, so she called my mummsie and said i need to go to primed. yeap. went and they refused to see me and said  i need to go to the emerency room. wonderful, have I ever mentioned how i hate hospitals? i HATE hospitals. so went and they gave me this lil wrist  band with my name and stuff. went and saw the doctor, asnwered billions of questions. he checked it out and said i scratched my ear canal and punch a nice lil hole in my membrane. why me?!!??!?! lol, so he gave me loratabs. fun fun, and said i needed to go to tha ear doctor, IN MONTGOMERY!! ah!! so we drove in the worst possible driving weather, i mean we were doing 30 something on the interstate with our emergency lights flashing, crazy i tell ya. so made it there the hosiptal had called a head,so they knew the story and made us fill out hundreds of forms and then i saw tha doc. he examined my ear with this huge ass machine and said he couldn't tell what exactly i had done the clot of blood was infront of the membrane, and they couldn't clean it becuz my ear had been dramatized enuff. he doesn't think i have a hole in my membrane but diffently scratched some stuff, so he gave us prescribtions. went to walgreens. chilled, ate a big and tastey. very nice, still wearing my lil wrist band so i look like an escaped hospital patient, lol. got ear drops and more loratabs and now im home. can't do alot of work or harsh movement, like jumping, yea whatever. so that was my grand aventure. my ear doesn't hurt just the dry blood is annoying that i can't pick out for fear of 'dramatizing' the ear. NOTE: DO NOT PLAY WITH METAL OBJECTS NEAR YOUR EAR - IT CAN RESULT IN MUCH LONG DRAWN OUT AVENTURES WITH UNPLEASENT EAR PAIN. thank you for ur time.

hooray!

well i stayed up last night and watched cinderella, great movie, then i woke up today and watched hercules. my dad left for a funeral, and said that i was going to o.d. on disney becuz i was planning on watching beauty and the beast after hercules. yesturday was lame not many people in school. got to jam to 'im a surviver' in chemistry, that was akward. lol. ashleys birthday was yesturday, and we went to long horn, great food as always. well my room is like really clean for once. odd. anyways today is prom so i hope everyone has a dazzling night those who are and aren't going. ive gotta go get my haircut, cuz i have split ends that are spliting, horrible i know, i don't really take good care of my self. my moms in shock about my eyebrows and is going to attack them later today, lol at lease i know where i get my cynical eye from. (my sister is going to attack my nails or rather lack of nails.) 
au revoir!

IM A LICENSED DRIVER!!!
yay!
lol, hoky so i got the drated thing, but alas i can not drive by myself yet. darn, but all i need my mom said was to drive a bit more, than she'll start letting me drive by myself. why did i get my license if i can't drive bymyself right away? incase of emergency i guese,some one could run out of gas, who knows. anyways yesturday was cool i watched mulan with my mom and ate steaks with my family. ashley is turning 20 tomorrow, ek! no gift but hopefully will get one later. ack!lol, well i have a bit of homework, but just wanted to shout out the news i got my license. later days.

well the lights decided to come back on at school (damn) rumors have it that we were close to being let out. (oh well) lol, im going to take my license test tomorrow! *crosses fingers* please oh please oh please!!! lol, im reading starwars III OMG!! this next movie is going to freakin ROCK!!!!!! can not wait! im currently looking for a niffy hairstyle for prom right now. humm... well, mrs. S (by the by for those who don't know i got a freakin 100 on my chemistry test!!! - first to be done on that test in mrs. S class) any way she drew a 'barometer' that looked alot like a penis so meanless to say my class was laughing for wuite some time, evn mrs.S was kinda chuckling as she told us it was in fact not the male antonmy. well toodles!

the studious student. You are definitely pressured
and suffer from side effects from built up
stress. You are constantly occupying yourself
with books, studies, or some other hobby. You
feel squeezed in place and have litte movement.
Most of the time you are busy with work and
family, and would love to spread your wings and
relax. One like you needs to find a certain
time of the day to just sit and release the
tension. However, you are doing fairly well in
school, but that does not mean that you can
continue stressing yourself out. Take a
breather and head out with some friends.


You can consider going into a field like
librarian, polotician, journalist,
Archeologist, scientist, or lawyer. You have a
brain...NOW USE IT....but please...spare
yourself the pressure and create some down time
for yourself. Or develop a hobby that releases
tension, such as knitting (it worked wonders
for me)

What type of teenager are you?

GLORY GLORY GLORY AUBURN!!!! lol, sorry just watched the sugar bowl dvd, and i feel like screaming WAR EAGLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i am so incredibiliy proud of auburn and that not only that they made it but us prattvillians got to go see them!!!!! bo-ya!
lol anyways my throat issssssss sooooooooo sore and im going to bowling tonight with fench club, gots solo and ensomble demain, and letse soo... oh yea today! lol, i slept for the first 30 minutes of alg, didn't miss anything teacher was out of the room, lol, and umm put a fish on madame, lol. hokay in france april fools day is called poisson d' avril, aka fish of april or just fishie day! and appartently in france they make paper fishies and write things on them and tape them to people so i made a fish that said i love fish! (in french of course) and taped it mme, some teacher pointed it out to her though. but yea... WAR EAGLE!!!!!!!!!

GREEN

??Which colour of Death is yours??
brought to you by Quizilla thought id add a quiz i liked. anywhose it gots chem to study for so here the basic info of my day.. woke up horrible weather, BUT i feel sooooo much better than i have in days!!!!!!! (shes healed i say healed!!!!) yet to watch the sugar bowl movie but im getting there. um... got interviewed for french club vice president, kinda struggled through the interview. ouchies. umm.... peanut butter jelly time!!! anyways, i am soo very sorry i forgot manders birthday and will make it up to her really. later (much later)

hokay so i woke up (very hard to do) at 5 my sis had food poisioning and was puking (eww) but shes feeling much better now. I apparently looked like shit today, lol, becuase half the school came up to me and asked if i was okay, sad, or had i been crying, or the more ovious question are u ill? lol, i don't mind peoples concern, but its kinda tirely after a while when nah shit its ovious something wrong with me (my eyes were red, and i had a faint circles and i was kinda pale i think, i dunno i thouhgt i looked hokay). lol, anyways thank you for everyones concern i am feeling much better after my nap. i struggled throught 3 blocks had enough and checked out. (hahahha bitchs!!) lol anywho i did actually consider using my illness as a weapon and couighing on these evil chicks in alg who make fun of me becuz their seniors and failing and im a 10th grader and passing (with an A!!) but i didn't, even though they were really rude in asking me to go outside when i blow my nose, (i would have anyway but hey u cxan ask nicely ya know?) mrs rone had a dead snake in her office (even i could smell it) and she showed it to me and it was kinda big and kinda gross. lol, i blame the drummers. (j/k)!! well i took a nice nap from 2 till 4 so i am refreshed and now i must finish (hooray) my evi lab report and alg and study for french test on health tomorrow, (the voc is hilarious, to say you have a high fever you say 'j'ai une fievre de chavel" which literally means i have the fever of a giraffe. lol and when u are not feeling well (like moi) u say "je ne suis pas dans mon assiette aujourd hui." which mean literally i am not in my plate today. lol. okay enough voc (but hey at lease i know it!) im off to do work i love ya and thankies for everyones concern i am feeling much better minus the dizzness from waking up.

hokay well lets see.. i woke up at 3 this morning becuase i couldn't breathe, no i didn't get back to sleep, but i did find out that the sun rises on the other side of my house so i can't see the prettyful sunrise. *sniffle* alex first thing he said to me this morning was "you look like shit" never the way to great a girl guys u should say good morning how are you feeling today? but not u look like shit- jeez. anywhose i pass out treats for my friendlies and went to first block, where one of my friends got a crewcut becuase his haircuter sneezed while trying to trim it. lol, poor guy. i managed to stay awake (for which i rewarded myself with peanut butter twix) during all my classes and left school at 2 for the doctors. well then heres a story, so as always we have to wait for hours in the waiting room and they ask me all these werid questions (one on a scale of 1 to 10 , 10 being the worst how doyou feel? well like if all my legs and arms were just cutt off was 10 then id say 7. lol) anyways they took x rays of me , which ive never had done before, lol totally werid and while we waited my mom and i drew on the white sheet you sit ontop of becuz they change it anyway so we played tick tack toe on it. lol, crazzy. appartently my right side of the face is completely blocked up (which is supposely rare for my age?) and that why my right eye is blurry (and why im getting dizzy so often) and my left lung or left side i dunno has broncidus. not good and yes i am contagious so don't piss me off ill breathe on you!!!!(muhahahahahahahahaha!!) but i can still go to school, yippee!!! when i have like 32 science problems and three sections in the workbook for chemistry, and finish that pisky lab report. did my alg two and i need to learn french voc for health (how ironic) lol, gots can can this thursday (yea!) a medivial dance to learn so i can teach it next week. band banquet, acdemic banquet and french club banquet to attend and the french banquet to plan and bowling with the pansies this friday, hooray. and solo and ensomble this weekend which ive yet to learn any of my music. im horrible i know, but hey im human and i shall get it done, with one eye too!! lol well im off for more work, and yes i realize my other picture wasn't a lil girl holding a flower, my breast were not showing, i was wearing clothes and the reason i took that shot was becuz my hair was curly and i like it, however if it was inoppraoite for peoples im awefully sorry and i changed to a pic of me in decatur at a park.

two updates in one day?!?
its unheard of i tell you!
anyways, we hunted for eggs, and the parents went first hiding them for ashley and i to find, i found twice literally, as much as ashley. then ashley and i hid them, and wow we found some great spots. lol, my mom touched two different eggs three times before she actually found them, and i had to play hot or cold for her to get them, lol. my dad hide an egg on top of the cieling fan (i just happened to glance up and saw it) my best hiding spot was an egg buried in the dirt of a plant and the top of it was covered by a sea shell - pretty good, eh? anyways we cooked i pretended to work on my formal lab report for chemistry, and we ate. and talked about the day i was born (odd topic) appartently it was exciting or something, and my grandma couldn't attend becuz she was sick, and my dad fell asleep at one point and mom beat him up. lol anyways im back at my lab report, and so far....i have a title, and some materials. impressive i know, well spring break is over, *sniffle* had a good break though i spent 60 freaking dollars on fast food, ice skating and a movie. and playing pool. not to shabby, eh? i luv iceskating!! wells im off have fun everyone back at school (yea right i know) and anyone gots the cosmic brownies?

this bites we leave tomorrow for the sugar bowl (WAR EAGLE BITCH) and my mom before she left for india (she for an update left yesturday morning for tennessee to get water from the jack daniels company and then went up north to collect helicopters and a forklift. well she got all those and now shes going to india not asia and she might be back much earlier than she thought! yay!) any who my mom took my to tha doc to get my shot and than for a check up cuz ive been ill for 2 and a half weeks and he asked my a bunch of questions - i really hate doctors- and gave me three prescriptions. well.. i drove to walgreens and as i left the car i slammed the door on my leg. (holy mother of smurf that hurt!) got my drugs and the doc said not to go to school or drive or use heavy machinary (yea right) after taking this cough suryup. soo i dunno how im supose to take it in new orleans without passing out becuz i almost coughed up my lung yesturday so im stuck taking it. so far its been okay i was tired last night when i took it so its hokay i passed out to sleep. this morning ive been tooting boxes down to the shed and ive been really tired since that but those boxes were heavy! my arms not really sore from the shot but damn my leg hurts! arg. well i have a practice purty soon and im waiting on clothes to dry so i can start packing for this insane trip.

yay! only 4 days left! gotta buy a dress or skirt or something..... well im kinda excited bout going to new orleans becuz the city is fuck ass awesome BUT HELL YES IM SO FUCKIN EXCITED TO SEE AUBURN PLAYING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! screw the half time show weagleweagle im going now to suport my team and hang out with my bestest buddies. and be in NEW ORLEANS! yay! well later days ive maxed out my mp3 it only holds 34 songs. pooey. have to bagder my parents to buy a memory clip. and soon. very soon. later.

hokay well my sister did manage to escape and the battlefield is deserted for the time being. humm my dad (whom i affectionly believe looks like a hamster) is like a little kid after christmas and has become obbsessed with playing galactic battlefield- star wars game that copys battlefield 1942- oviously the best game ive come across. humm..... well sides half listening to my dad complain that dath vader is doing better than him in the game im listening to look what you've done... freakie video really. well im pondering and i WANT INFO!! on wether or not a) continue my site b) should i attempt starting another spoof and that would be only if i really start back on my site i supose. course next semster is going to be hell (at lease i survived my ap class!! good luck by the by to my fellow friends about to take coach t's class) i have chem and alegbra II with trig. and french II which sucks becuz ever sine italy my accent has been very off and everything sounds italian. great. OH! fun filled news well im supose to go on a cruise  for spring break instead of expoloring another country, well issue is that my parents can't go nor my sister and my grandma's spring break is a week beofre mine soo i'd have to miss a week of school to go on a cruise with my grandma... then come back and have spring break! hum... so at lease i will be home for spring break! unless we find something to do... humm.....dilly do dee... well im awefully lonely and bored with no one to talk too.....!! alyssa went away.. and no one else is on...MERRY day after CHRISTMAS!!

well my head is still spinning around but i CAN BREATH! yay! my nosy has been all stuffy with my fever and stuff. dude sucks being 'ill' during christmas. but never the less i had a merry christmas! no problems!! yay!!!! but ofcourse becuz we went ONE holiday (OMG!) with out fighting TODAY the day AFTER christmas we (my family) must have problems. arg. my sister is living for the north for a week to visit her dad's relatives. well...about what they (my sister verses mama and papa) i have no idea... BUT it looks like her trip is canceled for something... i dunno .. i do hate fighting.. it wastes time. well my dad made this huge ass cinnimon rolls and there delicous!! yummy in my tummy. well now that im camped out here in the computer room to advoid conflictation (i would help but i was told to 'stay out the way and do NOT make eye contact') sooooo.. lets see we (our band) has four days (thats 4 hours per day meaning a total of 16 hours) to learn and memorize a completely new show for the SUGAR BOWL! yay! well i mean hooray for the sugar bowl fuck the practices it took us longer than  week to learn our half time show that we never even perfected.

WTF?!?!?

but hey im going to practice on my barie today soo maybe ill have one of these songs memorize (im think pirate melody....or god bless america who knows?!) hokay..enough drama lets see.... QUOTE OF THE DAY!

any waz to actually use this silly journal-

love. werid word. its not even cool enough to spell something backwards ( evol? wtf ) and besides that odd factor its one sylabal- and thats boring. so why does it matter so bloody much? i believe one of the hardest things for people (real people with feelings not robots that look like people) is to admit they love. some poeple are open hearted and foolish (meaning they love some one with a different name everyweek) others are close hearted (meaning they don't love.) lol im sure there are many other catorgories. but the main thing about love i know for sure is this: if its real- not just that once in a life time love of your bleedin life thing- but real love- then it will last forever. i dunno how to differ between in love and love. theres a difference for sure. i think you fall in love only once (well only really once) and thats supose to be the love of your bleedin life. but as for the other love. just love. its so painful at times. not only admittitn you love someone but having to watch them hurt, or struggle in life, or do something beyond stupid, or simply just to hurt them. a nother big difference between love is brotherly and passionately. or sexually to replace passionately. lol ofcourse im a teen. everything is passionate at this age. your feelings towards the opposite or same sex and your emotions run high when your pissed- easily senstive. another hard love to differ between the brotherly and passionately one. becuz the teen age is so passionate its hard to tell if u simply just want some one in lust or if theres just some underlining love that is meant to help in times of need. ofcourse this is all mumbled and rumbled in minds this may maynot make sense but for those who catch the drift what may shock you is this: theres an answer. thers really an answer to all of it. a way to tell. and its not jesus christ. lol sorry had to throw that one in, actually for some that may be an answer but they wear black and white and don't often get to have sex. sucks. but the other answer is simple. time. only time can show. ofcourse thats simple and dandy untill you throw in the ultimate factor. lifes short. it truely is. we'lll look on our death bed and go....shit im bout to end it all. or shit..im going numb..or hey even maybe a shit...i never got laid. so with all this going on through ur brain or right pass it. which ever one. i simply write this becuz its doing to me what it might be doing to you. running through my mind and making several laps and drinking gateraid. blue gateraid to be specific. anyways becuz time is the answer and time can only last for soo long. i say live life. live it in a way that when your in bed alone or happy snuggled next to some one, you won't look back and go shit....that was gay. which if we could all do that id say life would be much much much easier for the whole population. anyway another mind jogging thing- is reading romance novels really good? i mean does that help you clarify love? becuz i think those novels aren't trash exactly but jeez everyones happy and there areno probs and the hottest guy gets the hottest girl . real lifes not like that. sooo reading these novel might actually give a fake image of love to girls (or guys) in which when love reachs them they might reject it- becuz it wasn't what they read. just a though, another being...would i look good with bangs? just a thought cuz im bored of my hair. im not choping it off again, but its kinda dull and i hardly brush it anyways...and a hairstyle that requires no effort would be nice. hokay.. i think im done for the day....oh! dreams..another though..perhaps not all dreams are meant to be forfilled.. but its dreams that keep you going and give you something to work towards and maybe when you hit that road that splits..forfilling your dream or helping some one else....you'll really have shown love when u picked the right side of the split and gave up your dreams for some one else.

i love you mark! and my peeps.

well today was one if those weird days. but anyways ive been thinking, of course bout the future (always a fun thing to do) ok so ive always known i was going to college - more specificly - Auburn (hell yes!) because my parents have told me this. however ive been loking at careers that fasinate me and my dreams that all kids have (ya know the boys dream of being fire fighters and the girls wanna be nurses yea whatever) well none of those rewire college. my sister is at auburn right now and its soaking up alot of my parents money, so my parents really want me to get a scholarship for a college (any college i just wanna go to auburn) so im taking all those fun yet not really just really hard classes like ap history (cuz if in may i pass the test i get a college credit which means one less class my parents have to pay for) yet what has this all have to do with my dreams and shit? not everyone was born to achieve all their dreams, but what use is wondering in life knowing u never accomplished ur only dreams? ofcourse dreams change, mine have but not all. there is that other way of looking at life - ur dreams only mattered as a child to give u the inspiration to do what ur meant to do - become another citzen with a job that pays for the house, and bills. wow. i wanna go to college - i have this crazy idea of going to auburn like my dad and living with my best friend in a trailer with my cat, loki. (my dad and his best friend allen (whose my god father) lived in a trailer at auburn with a bunch of cats they named funnny things) i dunno why im rambling on about this really, none of my friends intend on going to auburn, and  most people say u never see high school friends after high school (yea whatever) im truely afraid of the future becuase i don't wanna wake up and realize im living in a crappy apartment with some random guy i married after college and my job is a paper pusher. that would be aweful. i truely wanna live some where else if not in alabama then in ireland, france, germany, swizterland, solvania, i don't care just some where. again i am rambling, then again this is a sort of journal for thoughts. i thought of how i could be sweet, organized, and etc(everything im not basicly). and realized thats not my nature, i really want a friend like that to balance me out. i think im better at best friend instead of group of friends yet i have a group of friends (which no offense are great but there are flaws within everything) theres so many comflicting thoughts running through my head i swear i could write an album by now with everything thats going on (it won't be a great album especically if im singing the songs) i don't believe ive been through everything in life but i feel ive had my dose of the good and bad things . ive been through a phrase of poems, writing songs, bible hugger, hiker, rock climbing, played soft ball, did gymastics, in band still, ive had my childhood memories some peasent other not, my dads been to war, my family closet is packed with horrors, ive been through death in the family, ive been in the depresso stage of life, yea cut myself, tried to overdose, was antorixa (dropped to 75 pounds) i use to help out my mom with the red cross, book nerd, still a scif loser,  cop trouble (gotten friend arrested for me roof surfing) use to have a horse (two actually the horse gave birth) been to, too many countries to list. have pregnaut friends, drugie friends, ive been in an accident that nearly costed me my life, ive had a dog, cat, bird, bunny, etc, ive been in a one year relationship, ive (thought) i really had found love once only to be dumped days later, drawing, yes ive even won at trivia pursuit before(it was the starwars version) ive snuck out of houses etc etc etc etc. yes there are things ive not been through in life. but i feel ive been through alot (as many teens my age have been through and feeel like) my history is as colorful as anyone else if not duller. i try so hard never to feel like i am to different from any one, my life shoudln't be any different than yours, but no matter how u look at this i feel ive been through enough. im tired of secrets i tired of wondering who i should be, what my future could be, why my past was what it was. even the god issue im tired of. (yes i believe there is a god whom created me, and loves me and listens to me, and protects me. and i love him. no i don't read the bible. no i don't pray everyday.) so as anyone who is still reading this ive jumped around topics alot. lol. wow im number than i was when i first started writing this. no one knows what the future will hold. u can't change ur past, but u can re live it if ur not careful. the present should never be ignored. learn to live life to its fullest. keep short lists, and forgive easily, life will go by quicker than u think. (another big fear of mine is knowing im dying and looking back on my life and realizing that half my life i spent mad, being overly senstive and shit. the other one is still fallingin love, thats a scary thing because u give a guy control over ur heart which controls alot of you)

well its 7:30 and i am not at school, becuase im bout to leaave for a funeral. my great aunt died tuesday. i knew her ofcourse, saw her twice a year once at christmas and thanksgiving. But that was it, no going to the fair together or any real closeness. i don't like funerals. so sad, and it always rains. which seem to add to the gloom, even though i like rain. i wish we could celebrate the dead, becuase hopefully their going to a better place. but if it was my sister or grandma i wouldn't be able to celebrate, so i guess it would be wrong to expect others to celebrate those close to them being dead. i haven't been to a funeral since my great grandfather died. that was my grandma and my great aunts dad. well nothing really to say, cept i hope everyone has a great day, and no condolencents needed, i am not terribly sad, but i am sad for my grandma, it was her sister.
